channel.title: [Reverse Challenge] revme
channel.description:
# revme The goal of the challenge is to retrieve the correct password. It's written in C and stripped. Hints might come up if needed.
Good luck!
## Difficulty 0 Easy - 5 Hard [poll type=number results=on_vote min=0 max=5 step=1] [/poll]
## Challenge
Retrieving the binary `cat revme.b64 | base64 -d | gunzip > revme`
sha256sum `a45228ba135c25d1a9826e37fd63e095ddc31ff1f9744afbada2069d61118cd3 revme`
### revme.b64 ```bash  ```
